Name: H. Burger

Name: H. Burger

Review Text: Not the best burger I had, but I really liked their sweet potato fries and homemade iced tea. Also very nice atmosphere and very kind, helpful staff.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Delicious burger as well as crunchy fries! This place puts an emphasis on using organic and local ingredients. The atmosphere is very cozy and has very friendly staff.

Highly recommended!

Name: H. Burger

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Overall very tasty burgers and fries. Too bad my meat was overcooked. I asked for medium rare and got it medium. Not the same.

Review Text: Tasty burger, amazing banana and peanut butter (homemade) milkshake and excellent service!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: I am sitting here as we speak, writing this review. First thing you will notice is the warm vine, chill music and homey feel. ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Best burger I've tried! It was delicious!! Definitely recommend trying it out :) The staff is also very friendly and the place felt very welcome   :)

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Disgusting. Bacon on burger was undercooked, fatty, chewy LARDONS (see pic). Patty tasteless, not enough seasoning. Tomatoes not fresh. Couldn't taste the cheese, overpowered by too much relish. Chips appeared recooked. So bad. ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Beautiful design of the restaurant. Great view from the shop.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Best burger in Amsterdam so far! And the staff was very friendly. We got the order very quick

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Amazing food and friendly staff!!  Best veggie burger I've ever had. The sweet potato and regular fries were both excellent.  And they were more than accommodating to make a choc/PB shake for my birthday boy - so tasty.  Highly, highly recommended!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Cool burgers! The veggie burger is especially good compared to other burger restaurant. Unfortunately I don't think this one would be our "go to" burger restaurant, like it's good but not incrediblamazing...Still a good option though!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Extremely tasty Burger and if you order for takeout, they manage to pack it all neat and safe without using plastic, which I find quite nice.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: My friend recommended H Burger for a long time. Did not disappoint. I tryed the cheese burger which was amazing. Can't wait to go back and try other stuff. Thanks guys.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Best Burger in town!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Despite our arrival near closing time, H. Burger welcomed us in and fed us well! Customer service was fantastic, and the veggie burger was delicious... Tasty, hearty, and fresh! I loved the housemade ketchup. A perfect late night, post-travel meal to start our visit in Amsterdam.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: So far best burger in Amsterdam. Great service, perfect food.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: The burgers are tasty and the interior has a nice touch to it. Good for a casual dinner.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: After I found this place never ordering my burgers somewhere else

Name: H. Burger
Review Text:
We had a delicious dinner at H. Burger. The atmosphere is great, good music on the background as it's a small place the noise level is very low.
Staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Fantastic! This place does amazing fries, burgers, and wings.  And all for reasonable prices.  Wings had a hot BBQ style sauce.  Burger cooked to a perfect medium.  Some of the best fries I've had in Amsterdam.  A nice dining area , a very friendly staff, and fast service.  This place has it all!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text:
This place has some proper burgers! I would recommend anyone that is looking for the best burger of the city to give a shot to that one with no hesitation.
The staff was very friendly and the service fast. The place is also decorated ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Amazing burgers, crispy fries, incredible sauces and great service and care. Definitely place to come back for.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Amazing experience with H. Burger. Not only was the food amazing,  their service was A++.  Due to a hiccup with Uber eats, the wrong order arrived. After calling H. Burger they ensured I got the burger I originally ordered in no time. Really appreciate the help and I will be ordering again. Great job you guys Thanks!!!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text:
Ordered takeaway, the barista was super friendly and we chatted the whole time that I was waiting, so that was much appreciated!
Great chicken burger with satay sauce, amazing sweet potato fries, for 17‚Ç¨ which ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Best burger in town! Service is top notch and they are very passionate about their food, from soft burger buns, to homemade mayo and ketchup for your fries. Ambiance is very chill, too, a good place to hang out! This is definitely my favorite burger place in Amsterdam.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Really tasty burgers and amazing milkshakes! I really liked the experience, though by now it's not the most original concept anymore. This hip burger restaurant checks all the boxes a hipster burger bar should. Including a high price tag. ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: This place is none like any burger place in Amsterdam. Their burgers are consistently of the best quality and taste. I make sure that any guest to Amsterdam I‚Äôm hosting visits H.  Burger.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Just wow, amazing burgers, amazing atmosphere. Will definitely come back, and I'd reccomend others to come to! :)

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Amazing! We love this place! We use to live in Amsterdam and go there a lot...now that we moved to Haarlem we come back as the hamburger is awesome!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Very friendly staff and delicious burgers!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Best food money can buy. Period. The veggie burger is honestly mind blowing. I've been told by several American friends that the meat burgers are hands down the best they've had in Holland. Spot on delicious sides. Homemade condiments. Cheesecake to die for. Genuine milkshakes. This place is a gem!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: H Burger has consistently amazing burgers, cooked to perfection, fries are crispy and delicious and the staff is very friendly. I go there at least 4 times a month. Definitely recommend!!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Easily the best vegetarian burger I ever had. Make sure to try this place! Run by very friendly people. They don't serve beer but have a fantastic assortment of soft drinks to compensate.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Plain but very good Burgers and nice personell.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: The burger is juicy and fresh with great quality of ingredients. The service and atmosphere is excellent. Recommended if you‚Äôre looking for a cozy place for burgers.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Great burger joint with artisanal homemade buns and sauces. Service is excellent and the staff is friendly. Going back over and over again :)

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Worth a try. The staff is so sweet, the bun combines so well the burger and ingredients taste is so good that the simplest burger is a pleasure. If you crave for a burger this is the place to stop by.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: They have the best sweet potato fries i have ever eat, i love them

Name: H. Burger
Review Text:
It's so simple and yet so good that I would call it the iPhone of the burgers.

Nice location, feels very warm and clean. ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Had the wagyu burger, the bun and the meat was good. Why not 5 stars? I think for the price of the burger (probably the most expensive by default), the topping and the sauce could be more interesting as in adding more flavor profiles. The wagyu's juicy fattyness dominated the burger a bit too much.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: I just had strawberry milkshake and thick fries and they were Amazing!!! The shake is super dense but not to sugary. Best shake ever. Plzzz just order it!!!! And staffs are really friendly. Bit pricy but I will definitely come back.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: The staff is always very welcoming and friendly. Best vegeterian burger I‚Äôve had so far with very tasty brioche bun.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Delicious food and really friendly service! The ketchup is clearly home made and tastes very fresh! The cheeseburger was dripping with cheese! And tasted great!!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Really good burgers and you can double them for cheap which is great for big eaters like myself. The milkshakes are absolutely amazing though. The stuff of high caloric legends.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text:
The Burgers are Top quality. The prices are good and the Burgers definitely filling
(I can eat). ‚Ä¶

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: I found it trough google maps. Saw the good Rezension but more important the good looking photos of the burgers. So we decided to eat there. It tastes sooooo good. Just go and eat here..

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: The best burger in town! Nice looking restaurant, great athmosphere, cool people and delicious burgers! Don't forget to order the cheesecake as dessert :-)

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: The cheeseburger and chocolate milkshake both really good. I was not a fan of the lemon cake as it was too sweet to my liking, hence, was not worth 5 euro for the dessert.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Very nice Burger, wings, fries and milk shake by candlelight..:)

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Burgers were fantastic, fries were brilliant, milkshakes were the best we‚Äôve ever had and we have had many. The service from both chefs and waiters was excellent.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: Possibly the BEST BURGER in Amsterdam or I will dare say Europe! The burgers are super awesome and the fries are great with homemade mayo and ketchup. Milkshakes and groovey  beverages as they dont have a liquor license. Worth a visit  to Oud-West if you love burgers.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: It is a quite nice little restaurant with everthing you need. All the meals are organic, homemade and delicious. For the desserts I recommend the apple nut cake. The best apple cake I ever eaten.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text:
Best Burger by far in Amsterdam.
Have tried almost all Burger places in town but no one beats H. Burger.
The staff is just amazing and the Burgers and fries are incredibly delicious.

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: By far the Best burgerjoint in Amsterdam. Some competitors claim to be The Best Burger in Town, but H.Burger IS The Best Burger in Town. For the vegetarians or if you'd like to try something else than the beef patty for a change, I would definitely recommend the veggie burger!

Name: H. Burger
Review Text: One of the tastiest burger I have had in Amsterdam, bread was perfectly toasted and all ingredient tasted super fresh üòç, it was a real delight!

Review Text: Very poor experience. Do not recommend.
